faculty_preferred_slots.description: Schedule faculty in their preferred days/slots for lectures

balanced_distribution.description: Spread lectures evenly across the week; avoid all lectures on same day

minimize_gaps.description: Avoid long idle gaps in a section's schedule

avoid_faculty_overload.description: Avoid back-to-back overload of classes for faculty

core_subjects_morning.description: Allocate core subjects in morning slots; electives later in day

minimize_free_periods.description: Reduce free periods for both students and faculty; labs with same room but different faculty allowed if capacity permits
